#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define lint long long
lint dp[5002][5002]={0};

//dp[i][j]====> for reaching i from j maximum jumps we can make
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int a[n+5];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        //cin>>a[i];
    }


    for(int i=1;i<n;i++) //destination point
    {
        for(int j=i-1;j>=0;j--) //end point
        {
            if(a[j]>a[i])
            {
                dp[i][j]=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[j+1][i]+1);
                dp[j][i]=dp[j+1][i];
            }
            else if(a[j]<a[i])
            {
                dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
                dp[j][i]=max(dp[j+1][i],dp[i-1][j]+1);
            }
            else //equal wala case
            {
                dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
                dp[j][i]=dp[j+1][i];
            }
        }
    }
    lint res;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        res=max(dp[0][i],dp[n-1][i]);
        printf("%lld ",res);
        //cout<<res<<" ";
    }
    return 0;
}
